#summary List of query parameters that work across all queries

  * *apikey*: 
    * Required. 
    * Description: Your API key.
    * Format: string
  * *pretty*:
    * Optional. 
    * Description: Prettify JSON results (easier to read). 
    * Format: set to '1' if you want prettified results.
  * *jsoncallback*: 
    * Optional. 
    * Description: Return response in [http://bob.pythonmac.org/archives/2005/12/05/remote-json-jsonp/ JSONP] format. Also, check out JQuery has nice [http://docs.jquery.com/Ajax/jQuery.getJSON support for JSONP callbacks]. 
    * Format: set to '1' if you want a response in JSONP format.
